text:
How to unstuck your ChatGPT from a loop.

Copy-paste the prompt below:

Prompt: "This still isn’t working. Pause and zoom out. Imagine you’re [Expert Name], a world-class authority here. How would you frame the problem? What steps would you take next? Outline their exact reasoning and actions."

Here's an example:

Prompt: "This still isn’t working. Pause and zoom out. Imagine you’re Justin Welsh, a world-class authority here. How would you frame the problem? What steps would you take next? Outline their exact reasoning and actions."

PS: This hack is backed by science.

Perspective-Taking Prompting (PeT): “Answer as 1st-person; then critique as a 3rd-person analyst; finally merge both.” Shown to diminish toxicity by up to 89% and bias by up to 73% in LLM responses (Xu et al., 2024)

Reshare ♻ to help others prompt ChatGPT better. 

PS: I share weekly prompts at Ruben Hassid.
